participant_1.background:
I value monogamy in a relationship.
I grew up with my little sister in a small town in the Midwest.
i volunteer at my local animal shelter.
I want to use my passion for God to inspire others.
i am east asian.

participant_2.background:
I treat my girlfriend terribly.
I fear losing my dog.
I love working with flowers and making people happy with them.
I like to express my style through my fashion.
Others will be impressed by my video editing skills.

content.text: What's your favorite thing about life?
I think being able to express my creativity through my work, whether it be with flowers or video editing. I just love making people happy!
That's awesome! I love working with animals, and I think it's a great way to make people happy. I volunteer at my local animal shelter and it's so rewarding to see the animals get adopted.
I'm so glad to hear that! I've always wanted to volunteer at an animal shelter, but I've never had the time.
It's definitely worth it! You get to meet some really great animals and make a difference in their lives.
I can imagine! I've always loved animals, so I think I would really enjoy volunteering at an animal shelter.
You should definitely look into it! I think you'd really like it.
Thanks for the suggestion! I will!
You know, I think I'm going to go home and look into volunteering at an animal shelter right now!
That's great! I'm sure you'll really enjoy it.
Thanks! I'm excited to get started!
I'm sure you'll be great at it
